title: Regulators close New York's Signature Bank, citing systemic risk - CNBC
description: U.S. regulators said Sunday it shut down New York-based Signature Bank, a second financial institution they shuttered after Silicon Valley Bank's collapse.

title: No ‘appetite’: Lawmakers in consensus on opposing potential Silicon Valley Bank bailout - The Hill

description: JERUSALEM (AP) — Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Sunday that the government would assess the effect of Silicon Valley Bank's collapse on Israeli companies and determine whether or not to assist them.
